Indio.CareerBuilder Challenge:
The CareerBuilder Challenge, formerly known as the Bob Hope Classic and the Humana Challenge, is a professional golf tournament in southern California on the PGA Tour. Played in mid-winter in the Coachella Valley (greater Palm Springs), it is part of the tour's early season "West Coast Swing." Known for its celebrity pro-am, it previously had five rounds of competition (90 holes) rather than the standard of four rounds.
For many years, the event was named for and hosted by entertainer Bob Hope and featured a number of celebrity participants.
